audioText: Je changerais cette approche ferme si la logique mathématique ne fonctionnait pas correctement dans ce contexte.
question: When would the speaker change this firm approach?
options: If mathematical logic didn't work correctly in this context
If the students showed resistance to learning
If the administration demanded different methods
If the results didn't meet expected standards
explanation: The correct answer is 'If mathematical logic didn't work correctly in this context'. The text states 'Je changerais cette approche ferme si la logique mathématique ne fonctionnait pas correctement dans ce contexte' - I would change this firm approach if mathematical logic didn't work correctly in this context. 'Changerais' is the first-person singular conditional of 'changer' (to change), and 'ferme' means 'firm'.
